fields.name: ModifiedPath
fields.description: Url path which user has provided for url rewrite. Null means no path will be updated. Default value is null.

fields.name: ModifiedQueryString
fields.description: Query string which user has provided for url rewrite. Null means no query string will be updated. Default value is null.

fields.name: Reroute
fields.description: If set as true, it will re-evaluate the url path map provided in path based request routing rules using modified path. Default value is false.
